title: Update Contact card labels to “Projects” and “Google Drive”

requirements.text: Update ONLY the two selected text nodes in the Contact section (XPath: /html/body/div/div/main/section[6]/div/div/div/a[3]/div[2]/div[1] and /html/body/div/div/main/section[6]/div/div/div/a[3]/div[2]/div[2]) so that the first line (label) displays exactly "Projects" and the second line (value) displays exactly "Google Drive".

quotes: Change this to Projects and change nother one to Google Drive

acceptanceCriteria: The contact item corresponding to the third <a> in Contact section shows label text exactly "Projects" (replacing the previous label).
The same contact item shows value text exactly "Google Drive" (replacing the previous value).
No other labels/values in the Contact section are changed.
The Google Drive link target (href) remains unchanged and still points to the existing data.googleDrive URL.

constraints: Apply changes ONLY to the two selected elements identified by the provided XPath expressions.
Use English for all user-facing text.
Do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui or other immutablePaths.
nonGoals: No changes to navigation titles, other sections, or the Google Drive URL/data model.
